verses.name: Luke 22:41
verses.text: And he was withdrawn from them about a stone’s cast, and kneeled down, and prayed,

verses.name: Luke 22:42
verses.text: Saying, Father, if thou be willing, remove this cup from me: nevertheless not my will, but thine, be done.

verses.name: Luke 22:43
verses.text: And there appeared an angel unto him from heaven, strengthening him.

verses.name: Luke 22:44
verses.text: And being in an agony he prayed more earnestly: and his sweat was as it were great drops of blood falling down to the ground.

verses.name: Luke 22:45
verses.text: And when he rose up from prayer, and was come to his disciples, he found them sleeping for sorrow,
